ED_Title: Appointment of the members of the Credentials Committee
ED_DecisionText: At its 1st plenary meeting, on 14 September 2021, the General Assembly, in accordance with rule 28 of its rules of procedure, appointed a Credentials Committee for its seventy-sixth session consisting of the following Member States: Bahamas, Bhutan, Chile, China, Namibia, Russian Federation, Sierra Leone, Sweden and United States of America.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
